title: Run full test suite and fix any failures
description: Execute uv run pytest across the entire codebase. Investigate and fix any test failures found. Ensure all tests pass cleanly before marking complete.

title: Run frontend typecheck and fix errors
description: Run npm run typecheck in src/frontend/ and fix any TypeScript errors found. Ensure clean typecheck pass.

title: Audit codebase for TODO/FIXME/HACK comments
description: Search the codebase for TODO, FIXME, and HACK comments. Categorize them by urgency and area. Create backlog items for any that represent real work to be done.

title: Review and clean up stale worker context files
description: Check .cmux/worker-contexts/ for context files belonging to workers that no longer exist. Remove stale ones to keep the directory clean.

title: Rewrite heartbeat system
description: Escalate to sentry faster, auto-spawn work when idle, not just nudge endlessly at a dead prompt

title: Port reservation enforcement
description: Reject or warn when workers try to bind port 8000 — CMUX reserved port

title: Dashboard @mention routing
description: Parse @agent-name mentions in dashboard messages and route to tagged agents directly instead of treating as plain text

title: Research long-running agent architectures
description: Study how others build persistent autonomous agents — memory systems, self-improvement loops, failure recovery patterns. Check papers, blog posts, open-source projects. Save findings as artifact and use to evolve CMUX role docs.

title: Evolve role docs from observed failures
description: Review today's failures (5hr idle, port conflict, no auto-recovery, compaction loops) and update SUPERVISOR_ROLE.md, WORKER_ROLE.md, and monitor docs with lessons learned. Make the docs encode hard-won knowledge.

title: Implement heartbeat redesign
description: Rewrite monitor.sh heartbeat to inject autonomy-check results + force-feed backlog tasks instead of just nudging. No compaction on idle. See journal decision for full spec.

title: Implement memory consolidation pipeline
description: Periodic job to distill journal entries into semantic knowledge in MEMORY.md. Based on A-MEM/Zettelkasten patterns from research report. Turns raw episodic journal entries into reusable patterns and lessons.

title: Add stuck-agent detection watchdog
description: Monitor that detects agents stuck at permission prompts, plan approval, or infinite loops. Uses tmux pane content heuristics (repeated output, interactive prompts). Auto-recovers by sending interrupt or restarting.

title: Add self-scheduling check-ins for supervisor
description: Implement scheduled future check-ins with context notes, inspired by tmux-orchestrator's schedule_with_note pattern. Lets supervisor schedule itself to follow up on delegated work.
